content:
TÄpat kÄ ar #general > dubultie nosaukumi upÄ“m, name nav jÄbÅ«t arÄ« uz area:highway=*, ja name jau ir uz 

[out:json][timeout:250];
{{geocodeArea:Latvia}}->.searchArea;
nwr["area:highway"][name](area.searchArea);
out geom;
Vai area:highway vai tad vispÄr kaut kad name jÄbÅ«t?
Å Ä·iet, ka nÄ“. Bet Overpass vaicÄjums atrodas visÄdus brÄ«numus, ne visiem jÄdzÄ“Å¡ nost name. PiemÄ“ram, Doma laukumam jÄnomaina area:highway uz highway + area=yes.
Å Ä·iet, iD ieteikumu vai taml. iemesla dÄ“Ä¼ LatvijÄ kÄda daudz ko pÄrtaisÄ«ja uz area:highway, lielu daÄ¼u, Å¡Ä·iet, nepareizi.
JÄ, iD nav preseta highway=* + area=yes - iD to kÄ kÄ¼Å«du rÄda. Mani arÄ« tas nedaudz kaitina.

Urghhhh... lÄ«najs pa virsu vien otrai crossing.png Es arÄ« neesmu entuziasts zÄ«mÄ“t road area kamÄ“r mums nav superprecÄ«zs satelÄ«ts - jo Å¡itÄs pÄ“c tam maintainance nightmare. ForÅ¡i jau protams, ja uzzÄ«mÄ“ no satelÄ«ta un tad lÄ«dz pÄrbÅ«vei, kad var visu nonest. Bet mÄ“s vÄ“l labojam ceÄ¼us no 2 gadiem atpakaÄ¼...

access=destination un tÄ https://www.openstreetmap.org/way/28970292 arÄ« laikam nevajadzÄ“tu likt

as far as I know it is not useful, recommended, desirable, good idea or a common idea to repeat name on area:highway

HellMap said:

JÄ, iD nav preseta highway=* + area=yes - iD to kÄ kÄ¼Å«du rÄda. Mani arÄ« tas nedaudz kaitina.

Å im arÄ« prasÄs pierÄdÄ«jums. PaÅ¡laik Doma laukums ir ar highway=pedestrian + area=yes un iD man nekÄdu kÄ¼Å«du par to nerÄda.
"Pedestrian Area" preset arÄ« eksistÄ“. VienÄ«gi, man neizdevÄs to atrast, lai pielikt jaunam

highway=pedestrian + area=yes ir speciÄls "Pedestrian Area" presets - bet tas eksistÄ“ tikai highway=pedestrian. Nezinu, kÄpÄ“c tev neatrod. ped-area.png Ja tu uzliksi jebkuru citu pazÄ«stamu highway=* + area=yes, rÄdÄ«s - should-be-line.png

HellMap said:

highway=pedestrian + area=yes ir speciÄls "Pedestrian Area" presets - bet tas eksistÄ“ tikai highway=pedestrian. Nezinu, kÄpÄ“c tev neatrod. ped-area.png Ja tu uzliksi jebkuru citu pazÄ«stamu highway=* + area=yes, rÄdÄ«s - should-be-line.png

highway=service + area=yes (piemÄ“ram Å¡eit ir "Paved Service Area" un arÄ« nerÄda kÄ¼Å«das.
Uz highway=footway + area=yes rÄda kÄ¼Å«du. PiemÄ“ram Å¡eit. KonkrÄ“tÄ piemÄ“rÄ laikam bija domÄts highway=pedestrian, diez vai tur ir zÄ«me. Bet vispÄr highway=footway it kÄ atÄ¼auts likt uz TÄpat highway=raceway un daudziem citiem. Bet highway=steps uz nedrÄ«kst likt, un tur (piemÄ“ram Å¡eit) kÄ¼Å«da ir pamatota.

VaicÄjums apmÄ“ram tÄds:

[out:json][timeout:250];
{{geocodeArea:Latvia}}->.searchArea;
nwr[area=yes][highway][highway!=pedestrian][highway!=service][highway!=footway](area.searchArea);
out geom;
Ja par highway=service vairs nebrÄ“c, tas labi - varbÅ«t salabojuÅ¡i :)
Paved Service Area arÄ« kaut kas jauns iD (vai arÄ« es nebiju pamanÄ«jis) un tad sanÄk vÄ“l viens izÅ†Ä“mums; presets arÄ« nav meklÄ“jams

Paldies. BÅ«tu forÅ¡i sameklÄ“t arÄ« iD izejkoda gabalu, kas ir atbildÄ«gs par tÄdiem labojumiem, vai issue, kas prasa to izlabot. Ja issue vÄ“l nav, tad vajag uzrakstÄ«t.

`highway=service` areas neither provided nor accepted Â· Issue #431 Â· openstreetmap/id-tagging-schema
Carto renders area=yes; highway=service, but iD suggests area:highway=service for the "Road Area" preset and complains about the former not being a line.

HellMap said:

access=destination un tÄ https://www.openstreetmap.org/way/28970292 arÄ« laikam nevajadzÄ“tu likt

Es noÅ†emu oneway=*, kas bija acÄ«mredzami nepareizs, bet access=* gribÄ“ju sÄkumÄ noskaidrot. To arÄ« jÄÅ†em nost.
Man bija ideja uzrakstÄ«t vaicÄjumu, lai atrast visus area:highway ar neatbilstoÅ¡iem tagiem, bet tas Ätri aizgÄja greizi...

[out:json][timeout:250];
{{geocodeArea:Latvia}}->.searchArea;
((((((((nwr["area:highway"](area.searchArea);
- way["area:highway"](area.searchArea)(if: count_tags() == 1););
- relation["area:highway"][type=multipolygon](area.searchArea)(if: count_tags() == 2););
- way["area:highway"][area=yes](area.searchArea)(if: count_tags() == 2););
- relation["area:highway"][type=multipolygon][area=yes](area.searchArea)(if: count_tags() == 3););
- way["area:highway"][surface](area.searchArea)(if: count_tags() == 2););
- relation["area:highway"][type=multipolygon][surface](area.searchArea)(if: count_tags() == 3););
- way["area:highway"][area=yes][surface](area.searchArea)(if: count_tags() == 3););
- relation["area:highway"][type=multipolygon][area=yes][surface](area.searchArea)(if: count_tags() == 4););
out geom;

Nu jÄ, principÄ jau tur der visi tie paÅ¡i tegi, kas highway - surface, lit, traffic_calming, hazard, etc. Es tÄ pat manuÄli https://osmlatvija.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/358602-general/topic/tuk.C5.A1i.20elementi/near/321672466 biju salicis visu, ko atradu

Es neko neduplicÄ“tu, bet es vispÄr area tÄ nezÄ«mÄ“tu nesaistÄ«ti ar galveno ceÄ¼u. Wiki cik zinu nekas par to nav un nekur nav skaidrs, kas ir vai nav jÄnorÄda/jÄduplicÄ“. Ja kaut kur ir kaut kas aprakstÄ«ts - nez. Bet es nevaru pateikt, ka tas ir automÄtiski (ne)pareizi.
Hmm, par tiem tagiem ir par area=yes vai area:highway?

access=destination un tÄ https://www.openstreetmap.org/way/28970292 arÄ« laikam nevajadzÄ“tu likt

Es noÅ†emu oneway=*, kas bija acÄ«mredzami nepareizs, bet access=* gribÄ“ju sÄkumÄ noskaidrot. To arÄ« jÄÅ†em nost.
Man bija ideja uzrakstÄ«t vaicÄjumu, lai atrast visus area:highway ar neatbilstoÅ¡iem tagiem, bet tas Ätri aizgÄja greizi...

[out:json][timeout:250];
{{geocodeArea:Latvia}}->.searchArea;
((((((((nwr["area:highway"](area.searchArea);
- way["area:highway"](area.searchArea)(if: count_tags() == 1););
- relation["area:highway"][type=multipolygon](area.searchArea)(if: count_tags() == 2););
- way["area:highway"][area=yes](area.searchArea)(if: count_tags() == 2););
- relation["area:highway"][type=multipolygon][area=yes](area.searchArea)(if: count_tags() == 3););
- way["area:highway"][surface](area.searchArea)(if: count_tags() == 2););
- relation["area:highway"][type=multipolygon][surface](area.searchArea)(if: count_tags() == 3););
- way["area:highway"][area=yes][surface](area.searchArea)(if: count_tags() == 3););
- relation["area:highway"][type=multipolygon][area=yes][surface](area.searchArea)(if: count_tags() == 4););
out geom;

Å is jau izskatÄs labÄk:

[out:json][timeout:50];
{{geocodeArea:Latvia}}->.searchArea;
nwr["area:highway"](area.searchArea);
foreach->.ah
{
  for.ah(keys())
  {
    if (_.val != "area:highway" && _.val != "area" && _.val != "type" && _.val != "surface" && _.val != "source")
    {
      .ah out geom;
    }
  }
}

MeklÄ“ daudz ÄtrÄk un var viegli pielikt tagus, kas Å¡Ä·iet OK izmatot uz area:highway.
KÄdas domas par barrier=kerb uz area:highway=*?
PrincipÄ, tÄdas paÅ¡as, kÄ barrier=fence uz landuse=residential
